definitions.title: conj.
definitions.body: except, but (from [[לָא]] and [[הֵן]] ‘not if’ (cf. Heb. [[אם לא]] Ge 24:38); so Nab. and Eg. Aram. [[להן]] Cooke:217, 219, 241 S-C:Pap. C 6, 7 +; lâinnî, however Socin:Arab. Dial. v. Marokko 44, Anm. 103; Targum [[אִילָּהֵין]] Ge 32:28, Ge 43:3 al.);—
after a neg. (= BH [[כִּי אִם]], q.v.):
without a neg.: however, but Ezr 5:12. p. 50
